inclusion.criterion: Complete baseline documentation sent to GBG Forschungs GmbH;
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Tumor lesion in the breast with a palpable size of ≥ 2 cm or a sonographically size of at least 1 cm in maximum diameter.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patients should have stages of disease in which adjuvant chemotherapy would be considered.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Locally advanced tumors with cT4 or cT3
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Karnofsky Performance status index at least 80%;
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Normal cardiac function must be confirmed by ECG and cardiac ultrasound (LVEF or shortening fraction) within 1 month prior to registration.
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Hematology: Absolute neutrophil count (ANC) ≥ 2.0 x 10e9/L platelets ≥ 100 x 10e9/L, Hemoglobin ≥ 10 g/dL (≥ 6.2 mmol/L)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Hepatic function: Total bilirubin < 1 x UNL ASAT (SGOT) and ALAT (SGPT)≤ 2.5 x UNL
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Renal function: Creatinine ≤ 175 µmol/L (2 mg/dL) < 1,25 UNL (or the calculated creatinine clearance ≥ 60 mL/min)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Paraffin tumor tissue block and two serum samples centrally made available
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Complete staging work-up within 3 months prior to registration.
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Patients with low or moderate risk, which are only doubtful candidates for adjuvant chemotherapy
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient is a 12 year old girl with Turner syndrome, treating with GH since 6 months ago. She has short stature, delayed in puberty and developmental delay.
